title: 'Ant-Man' sequel set for 2018, 'The Incredibles 2' for 2019
text:
> Entertainment 'Ant-Man' sequel set for 2018, 'The Incredibles 2' for 2019 FILE - In this July 13, 2015 file photo, Paul Rudd attends a special screening of "Ant-Man" in New York. "Ant-Man" is getting a sequel. "Ant-Man and the Wasp," set for release on July 6, 2018, the studio announced in Thursday, Oct. 8. (Photo by Charles Sykes/Invision/AP, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
